codeSystems.name: ActPriorityVS
codeSystems.title: v3 Code System ActPriority
codeSystems.description: A set of codes (e.g., for routine, emergency), specifying the urgency under which the Act happened, can happen, is happening, is intended to happen, or is requested/demanded to happen.

codeSystems.name: ConditionClinicalStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Condition Clinical Status
codeSystems.description: This defines a set of codes for Condition Clinical Status.

codeSystems.name: ConditionCodeVS
codeSystems.title: Condition Code
codeSystems.description: This value set defines set of codes for Condition Code.

codeSystems.name: EncounterClassVS
codeSystems.title: V3 Value SetActEncounterCode
codeSystems.description: Domain provides codes that qualify the ActEncounterClass (ENC)

codeSystems.name: EncounterDiagnosisUseVS
codeSystems.title: DiagnosisRole
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

codeSystems.name: EncounterHospitalizationAdmitSourceVS
codeSystems.title: Admit Source
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate from where the patient came in.

codeSystems.name: EncounterHospitalizationDischargeDispositionVS
codeSystems.title: Discharge disposition
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to where the patient left the hospital.

codeSystems.name: EncounterHospitalizationSpecialArrangementsVS
codeSystems.title: Special arrangements
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

codeSystems.name: EncounterHospitalizationreAdmitSourceVS
codeSystems.title: v2 RE-ADMISSION INDICATOR
codeSystems.description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0092 ( RE-ADMISSION INDICATOR)

codeSystems.name: EncounterHospitalizationreDietVS
codeSystems.title: Diet
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

codeSystems.name: EncounterHospitalizationreSpecialCourtesyVS
codeSystems.title: Special courtesy
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate special courtesies provided to the patient.

codeSystems.name: EncounterLocationServiceClassInpatientVS
codeSystems.title: Encounter Location ServiceClass-Inpatient
codeSystems.description: A set of codes, specifying location ServiceClass for inpatient patient.

codeSystems.name: EncounterLocationServiceClassOutpatientVS
codeSystems.title: Encounter Location ServiceClass-Outpatient
codeSystems.description: A set of codes, specifying location ServiceClass for outpatient patient.

codeSystems.name: EncounterLocationStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Encounter Location Status
codeSystems.description: The status of the location.

codeSystems.name: EncounterLocationTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Encounter Location Type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

codeSystems.name: EncounterLocationUpgradeClassVS
codeSystems.title: Encounter Location Upgrade Class
codeSystems.description: A set of codes, specifying location UpgradeClass.

codeSystems.name: EncounterReasonCodesVS
codeSystems.title: Reason Code
codeSystems.description: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

codeSystems.name: EncounterServiceTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Service type
codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

codeSystems.name: EncounterStatusVS
codeSystems.title: EncounterStatus
codeSystems.description: Current state of the encounter.

codeSystems.name: EncounterTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Encounter type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

codeSystems.name: ParticipationTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Participant type
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter
